languages.text: {n}Серия быстрых ударов в бубен, обладающих сложным, рваным ритмом сопровождает каждое ваше слово. Откуда-то из вокса, спрятанного где-то в стене, раздается ответный треск. Склонив голову на бок, техношаман говорит:{/n} "Великий Преф хочет знать, кто говорит с ним".

{n}Every word you say is accompanied by a series of quick drum taps in a complex, choppy rhythm. Crackling comes in response from a vox hidden somewhere inside the wall. The tech-shaman tilts his head and says,{/n} "The Great Pref would like to know who is speaking to him."
languages.original_text: {n}Серия быстрых ударов в бубен, обладающих сложным, рваным ритмом сопровождает каждое ваше слово. Откуда-то из вокса, спрятанного где-то в стене, раздается ответный треск. Склонив голову на бок, техношаман говорит:{/n} "Великий Преф хочет знать, кто говорит с ним".

traits.locale_text: {n}Every word you say is accompanied by a series of quick drum taps in a complex, choppy rhythm. Crackling comes in response from a vox hidden somewhere inside the wall. The Tech-Shaman tilts his head and says,{/n} "The Great Pref would like to know who is speaking to him."
traits.speaker: TechShaman

traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}あなたの一言一言は、複雑な連打のリズムを奏でる一連のすばやいドラムさばきと共に届けられる。壁の中のどこかに隠されたヴォクスから、パチパチと応答する音が鳴る。技術祈祷師は首をかしげて言った。{/n}「偉大なプレフが話し相手について知りたいと」
languages.original_text: {n}Every word you say is accompanied by a series of quick drum taps in a complex, choppy rhythm. Crackling comes in response from a vox hidden somewhere inside the wall. The tech-shaman tilts his head and says,{/n} "The Great Pref would like to know who is speaking to him."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの一言一言は、複雑な連打のリズムを奏でる一連のすばやいドラムさばきと共に届けられる。壁の中のどこかに隠されたヴォクスから、パチパチと応答する音が鳴る。技術祈祷師は首をかしげて言った。{/n}「偉大なプレフが話し相手について知りたいと」
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}你每说一个字，都会响起一串快速的鼓点，节奏复杂，起伏不定。藏在墙内某处的音阵装置发出了噼啪声，作为回应。技术萨满歪过头，问道：{/n}“伟大的普雷弗想知道，是谁在跟他说话。”
languages.original_text: {n}Every word you say is accompanied by a series of quick drum taps in a complex, choppy rhythm. Crackling comes in response from a vox hidden somewhere inside the wall. The tech-shaman tilts his head and says,{/n} "The Great Pref would like to know who is speaking to him."

traits.locale_text: {n}你每说一个字，都会响起一串快速的鼓点，节奏复杂，起伏不定。藏在墙内某处的音阵装置发出了噼啪声，作为回应。技术萨满歪过头，问道：{/n}“伟大的普雷弗想知道，是谁在跟他说话。”
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}Chaque mot que vous prononcez est accompagné d'une série de tapotements sur un rythme complexe entrecoupés de pauses plus ou moins longues. En réponse, un vox probablement incrusté quelque part dans le mur émet des sortes de crépitements. Le technochaman incline la tête.{/n} « Le grand Pref voudrait savoir qui lui parle. »
languages.original_text: {n}Every word you say is accompanied by a series of quick drum taps in a complex, choppy rhythm. Crackling comes in response from a vox hidden somewhere inside the wall. The tech-shaman tilts his head and says,{/n} "The Great Pref would like to know who is speaking to him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Chaque mot que vous prononcez est accompagné d'une série de tapotements sur un rythme complexe entrecoupés de pauses plus ou moins longues. En réponse, un vox probablement incrusté quelque part dans le mur émet des sortes de crépitements. Le technochaman incline la tête.{/n} « Le grand Pref voudrait savoir qui lui parle. »
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}A cada palabra que dices la acompañan varios toques rápidos al tambor a un ritmo agitado. A modo de respuesta, se escucha el crujido de un voco oculto en alguna zona de la pared. El tecnochamán ladea la cabeza y dice:{/n} «El Gran Pref quiere saber quién le habla».
languages.original_text: {n}Every word you say is accompanied by a series of quick drum taps in a complex, choppy rhythm. Crackling comes in response from a vox hidden somewhere inside the wall. The tech-shaman tilts his head and says,{/n} "The Great Pref would like to know who is speaking to him."

traits.locale_text: {n}A cada palabra que dices la acompañan varios toques rápidos al tambor a un ritmo agitado. A modo de respuesta, se escucha el crujido de un voco oculto en alguna zona de la pared. El tecnochamán ladea la cabeza y dice:{/n} «El Gran Pref quiere saber quién le habla».
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}Jedes deiner Worte wird von einer Reihe schneller Trommelschläge in einem komplexen, abgehackten Rhythmus begleitet. Als Reaktion ertönt aus einem Vox, das irgendwo in der Wand verborgen ist, ein Knistern. Der Tech-Schamane legt den Kopf schief und sagt:{/n} "Der Große Präf möchte wissen, mit wem er spricht."
languages.original_text: {n}Every word you say is accompanied by a series of quick drum taps in a complex, choppy rhythm. Crackling comes in response from a vox hidden somewhere inside the wall. The tech-shaman tilts his head and says,{/n} "The Great Pref would like to know who is speaking to him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jedes deiner Worte wird von einer Reihe schneller Trommelschläge in einem komplexen, abgehackten Rhythmus begleitet. Als Reaktion ertönt aus einem Vox, das irgendwo in der Wand verborgen ist, ein Knistern. Der Tech-Schamane legt den Kopf schief und sagt:{/n} "Der Große Präf möchte wissen, mit wem er spricht."
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}Söylediğin her söze, bir dizi hızlı, kompleks ve değişken davul ritmi eşlik ediyor. Yanıt olarak duvarların içinde bir yere gizlenmiş bir vokstan çıtırtılar geliyor. Tekno şaman, başını kaldırıp konuşuyor.{/n} "Ulu Pref, onunla konuşanın kim olduğunu öğrenmek istiyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Every word you say is accompanied by a series of quick drum taps in a complex, choppy rhythm. Crackling comes in response from a vox hidden somewhere inside the wall. The tech-shaman tilts his head and says,{/n} "The Great Pref would like to know who is speaking to him."

traits.locale_text: {n}Söylediğin her söze, bir dizi hızlı, kompleks ve değişken davul ritmi eşlik ediyor. Yanıt olarak, duvarların içinde bir yere gizli bir vokstan çıtırtılar geliyor. Tekno şaman başını kaldırarak konuşuyor:{/n} "Ulu Pref onunla kimin konuştuğunu öğrenmek istiyor."
traits.speaker: TechShaman
